title: Beautiful days and simple flows
description: In the week leading to the Oscars, and the weeks after its groundbreaking 5 Oscar sweep for auteur Sean Baker and lead Mikey Madison, conversations about the ethics of Anora, a film that explores the complexities of sex work, divided intellectual public discourse. Some argued that as a man, Baker unqualified to explore sex work from a female perspective.
